title: The Amber Light
description: “And it was foretold, that a being of unimaginable power would be born, born of human form, and raised with no idea of her importance. Her destiny. Though many will come before her, she will have the power to surpass all others of her kind. But, will she use her power for the good of humanity, or will she stand with those who wish to rule it?”When Ambrosine wakes, she finds herself with no idea of who - or what - she is. But behind the scenes, a war is brewing and when it comes, the fate of all humanity will hang in the balance. Can she regain her memories, and discover her destiny before it's too late?
author: Becky-Elizabeth Searson
